p: Reviewer #3: 1) Figure 2: AGPAT1 expression is decreased in cells and whole mosquitos. Given that the virus disseminates from the midgut and that the decrease in AGPAT1 expression does not explain the observed increase in aminophospholipids in the midgut early in infection, the authors should also measure AGPAT1 and 2 expression in the mosquito midgut.
